```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

## Import data

```{r import-data}
pis.vols.sess.hrs <- read.csv("analysis/csv/pi.vols.sess.hrs.csv")
```

## By Number of Volumes

```{r most-vols}
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
pis.vols.sess.hrs %>%
  select(pi, institution, vols, sessions, hrs) %>%
  arrange(desc(vols)) %>%
  knitr::kable()
```

## By Sessions

```{r most-sessions}
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
pis.vols.sess.hrs %>%
  select(pi, institution, vols, sessions, hrs) %>%
  arrange(desc(sessions)) %>%
  knitr::kable()
```

## By Hours

```{r most-hrs}
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
pis.vols.sess.hrs %>%
  select(pi, institution, vols, sessions, hrs) %>%
  arrange(desc(hrs)) %>%
  knitr::kable()
```
